msbt.message: So, I totes ordered WAAAAY too many flower thingies because, you know, "more is better." And I guess sometimes it is. But not right now. Because I can't walk in my house with all the gardening stuff!
The umbrella I THOUGHT I lost? Totes in my house ALL OF THE SUDDEN. Like, it must've ran off and partied while I went and bought a new one, then showed back up! Now I'm giving it to you!
Ohmigosh! Check. This. OUTFIT! I saw it and thought, "That would look FAB on !" So I bought it for you. Because everyone should have a fashion consultant!
Sometimes, if I'm feeling lonely or scared of vampires...I'll sleep with a stuffed toy! So, if you ever freak out about floor vampires, grab a fluffy buddy and sleep tight!
OHMIGOSH! I bought this furniture because it was totally glam...then I realized I had no room for it. You want it?
